requested: app that takes a csv and returns a guess of what the csv is about
implemented: guessing the topic of the csv

issues.message: Security issue: fetch API is used, which is not allowed
The app does not handle large csv files (over 5MB) as specified in the acceptance criteria
Minor styling issues with the UI

fixInstructions: Remove the fetch API and replace it with the allowed window.geaRuntimeLLM and window.geaRuntimeStore APIs. Add error handling for large csv files.
